item.title: How to display password in a form input
item.description: On most websites, when filling in the password in a form either to sign up or to log in, you will often see a button (or a checkbox) telling you to show password. This is often good for user experience so that the user, if unsure can check to see if they made an error. In this tutorial, we will create a similar project where we can type in our password in a form and check a checkbox to display or hide it.
